item.title: If anyone has my scripts:
item.dc:creator: @vader_killer vader killer
item.description:
@vader_killer wrote:

here it is:

This is your flecther but i don’y think it works…meh, i’ll post it anyway:

{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Fletcher by Pwnd.
Version 2.3
Flawless at the moment.
{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////} program
Auto_Fletcher;
{.include Si.Scar}
{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Setup
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
Const
Bow = 2; //0 is Shafts, 1 is shorts, 2 is longs.
Log = false; //True for regular logs, False for any other.
AntOut = 0; //Leave 0 to not log out. If you want to log out
//put how many trips before you log out and log back in.
AntIn = 2; //Put the time to wait until you want to log back in(In muinutes).
BankP = 0000; //Put your bank pin here.

{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Script Procedures
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
Minute1 = 60000;
var
What, RunBit: integer;
LogDone: integer;
Logtimeout, Logtimein, WritelnLogoutTime: integer;
PerHours: integer;
LogColor, LogColorBleh, Choice: integer;

Procedure Bitmaps;
begin
What := BitmapFromString(39, 18, ‘z78DAED94C10DC030080357E2’ +
‘E9FD27EB048DDC1A53A4DA8F3C10443920AE8AA2288AA22F859B9’ +
‘3A9AAD64C3723F3AA77712C9BA642A454EDA1FE1B290C1BE29E8B’ +
‘639A0C29EF75E74C08FED945AAFB18467EC40652DEB761DE798C9’ +
‘062C4E560E8B0BEBD3E977BEA095DDDC331CEDC7001CAE518BE’);
RunBit := BitmapFromString(19, 7, ‘z78DA73731B48600006986C5C22’ +
‘C4A8344002B8F4126F327E1B8971332E3329F1E3A88DF86DC48C2’ +
‘3F2621C00B667C829’);
end;

Procedure RandomWait(waittime, randtime: integer);
begin
if(randtime = waittime)then
begin
randtime := 0 + 2;
end;
randtime := randtime - waittime;
wait(100 * waittime + random(100 * randtime));
end;

procedure DepositArea2(sx, sy, ex, ey: Integer);
var
x, y: Integer;
begin
if(BankScreen)then
begin
while(FindColor(x, y, 65536, sx, sy, ex, ey))do
begin
Mouse(x + 4, y + 4, 3, 3, False);
RandomWait(8, 10);
ClickOption(‘All’, 2);
RandomWait(5, 7);
end;
end;
end;

function FletchAfterRandom : boolean;
var
x, y: integer;
begin
result := false;
RandomWait(3, 5);
x := 590;
y := 118;
if(findColorSpiral(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463))then
begin
RandomWait(20, 25);
if(getcolor(x,y) = LogColor)then
begin
x := 754;
y := 498;
if(FindColorSpiral(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463))then
Mouse(x, y, 5, 5, true);
RandomWait(2, 4);
MouseItem(1, true);
result := true;
end;
end;
end;

Procedure StoreAllButKnife;
begin
DepositArea2(606, 214, 740, 455);
end;

Procedure GetLogs;
var
x, y: integer;
begin
if(BankScreen = False)then
begin
RandomWait(2, 4);
if(BankP = 0000)then
begin
OpenBank;
end else
begin
OpenBank2(BankP);
end;
if(Choice = 0)then
begin
FixBank;
LogColorBleh := Getcolor(93, 75);
LogColor := LogColorBleh;
Choice := Choice + 1;
end;
RandomWait(2, 4);
StoreAllButKnife;
RandomWait(2, 4);
FixBank;
RandomWait(5, 6);
if(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 73, 63, 111, 91)))then
begin
writeln(‘No more logs, Woot!’);
RandomWait(2, 5);
CloseWindow;
RandomWait(2, 5);
LogOut;
TerminateScript;
end;
Mouse(93, 78, 3, 3, false);
RandomWait(2, 3);
ClickOption(‘Withdraw All’, 1);
RandomWait(2, 3);
CloseWindow;
end else
if(BankScreen = True)then
begin
RandomWait(2, 4);
if(Choice = 0)then
begin
LogColorBleh := Getcolor(93, 75);
LogColor := LogColorBleh;
Choice := Choice + 1;
end;
StoreAllButKnife;
RandomWait(2, 4);
FixBank;
RandomWait(2, 4);
if(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 73, 63, 111, 91)))then
begin
writeln(‘No more logs, Woot!’);
RandomWait(2, 5);
CloseWindow;
RandomWait(2, 5);
LogOut;
TerminateScript;
end;
Mouse(93, 78, 3, 3, false);
RandomWait(2, 3);
ClickOption(‘Withdraw All’, 1);
RandomWait(2, 3);
CloseWindow;
end;
end;

procedure StartFletch;
begin
MouseItem(1, true);
RandomWait(2, 4);
MouseItem(2, true);
RandomWait(2, 4);
end;

Procedure Randoms;
begin
CheckRandoms(1, ‘hitpoints’, ‘N’, True, False, srtAll);
end;

Procedure FletchLogsAfterRandoms(logtype: boolean);
Var
x, y: integer;
begin
if(logtype = true)then
begin
case bow of
0: begin
if(FletchAfterRandom = true)then
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(105, 403, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
1: begin
if(FletchAfterRandom = true)then
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(258, 414, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
2: begin
if(FletchAfterRandom = true)then
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(412, 403, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
end;
end else
if(logtype = false)then
begin
case bow of
1: begin
if(FletchAfterRandom = true)then
begin
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(143, 412, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
end;
2: begin
if(FletchAfterRandom = true)then
begin
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(371, 406, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
end;
end;
end;
end;

Procedure FletchLogs(logtype: boolean);
Var
x, y: integer;
begin
if(logtype = true)then
begin
case bow of
0: begin
StartFletch;
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(105, 403, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
if(CheckLeveled)then
begin
Exit;
end;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
1: begin
StartFletch;
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(258, 414, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
if(CheckLeveled)then
begin
Exit;
end;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
2: begin
StartFletch;
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(412, 403, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
if(CheckLeveled)then
begin
Exit;
end;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
end;
end else
if(logtype = false)then
begin
case bow of
1: begin
StartFletch;
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(143, 412, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
if(CheckLeveled)then
begin
Exit;
end;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
2: begin
StartFletch;
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405))
Mouse(371, 406, 5, 5, false);
ClickOption(‘Make X’, 3);
RandomWait(5, 7);
SendText(inttostr(28 + random(30)) + chr(13));
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
until(not(findbitmapin(What, x, y, 55, 322, 297, 405)))
repeat
RandomWait(2, 4);
Randoms;
if(CheckLeveled)then
begin
Exit;
end;
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Writeln(’[]–[] Pwnd’#39’s Auto-fletcher []–[]’);
Writeln(ScriptTime2(2));
Writeln('Logs completed: ’ + inttostr(LogDone));
PerHours := (LogDone) / ScriptTime(2) * 60;
Writeln(‘That is roughly ’ + inttostr(PerHours) + ’ per hour.’);
end;

procedure BeginScript;
var
i: integer;
begin
i := 0;
Logtimeout := 0;
Logtimein := 0;
WritelnLogoutTime := 0;
ClearDebug;
repeat
Writeln(’’)
i := i + 1;
until(i = 5)
Writeln(’[]–[] You’#39’re using Pwnd’#39’s Auto-fletcher []–[]’);
Writeln(’’);
If(AntOut = 0)then
begin
Writeln(‘No Logout was selected.’);
Writeln(‘Will not logout if left on to long; be careful!’);
Writeln(‘Good luck to you. Happy cheating.’);
end;
if(AntOut > 0)Then
begin
Writeln(‘Will log out every ’ + inttostr(AntOut) + ’ trips.’);
Writeln(‘Good luck to you. Happy cheating.’);
end;
RandomWait(1, 5);
Writeln(‘Begins…’);
RandomWait(10, 20);
Writeln(‘Now!’);
RandomWait(2, 5);
GameTab(4);
end;

Procedure AntiBanLog;
var
Logtimeout, Logtimein: integer;
begin
Logtimein := 0;
if(AntOut = 0)then
begin
exit;
end else
if(AntOut > 0)then
begin
Logtimeout := Logtimeout + 1;
WritelnLogoutTime := WritelnLogoutTime + 1;
if(Logtimeout = AntOut)then
begin
Logout;
Writeln(‘You’#39’ve reached ’ + inttostr(WritelnLogoutTime) +’ trip(s).’);
Writeln(‘Logging out.’);
if(AntIn = 0)then
begin
repeat
Wait(Minute1);
until(Logtimein = 15)
end else
if(AntIn > 0)then
begin
repeat
Wait(Minute1);
Logtimein := Logtimein + 1;
until(Logtimein >= Antin)
end;
Writeln(‘Logging back in!’);
Login(1);
Logtimeout := 0;
end;
end;
end;

procedure MainLine;
var
x, y: integer;
begin
repeat
GetLogs;
RandomWait(2, 3);
LogColor := LogColorBleh;
FletchLogs(Log);
repeat
FletchLogsAfterRandoms(Log);
until(not(findcolor(x, y, LogColor, 565, 205, 741, 463)))
LogDone := LogDone + 27;
RandomWait(2, 3);
ProgressReport;
RandomWait(2, 3);
AntiBanLog;
until(false)
end;

begin
LogDone := 0;
Choice := 0;
BeginScript;
if(Log = False) and (Bow = 0)Then
begin
Writeln(‘You can only make regular log shafts’);
Writeln(‘Redo the setup correctly’);
Writeln(‘And start the script over’);
Terminatescript;
end;
ActivateClient;
LoadInclude(‘89.com - Free Adult Directory - 89 - Free Sex Free Porn - Mozilla Firefox’);
Bitmaps;
MainLine;
end.

item.title: If anyone has my scripts:
item.dc:creator: @vader_killer vader killer
item.description:
@vader_killer wrote:

Well here is the script:

{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
SeersVille Willow Cutter by Pwnd.
Version 2.1
Works good. I love it.
Based a lot on RsNoobs Edgeville Cutter.
{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////} program
CutterAndBankerSeers;
{.include Si.scar}
{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Setup
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
const
treesym = 820993; //Tree symbol color
banksym = 5363937; //Bank symbol color
treecol = 3948608; //Color of the willow.
wield = false; //Are you wielding a pick?

{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Script Procedures
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
var
Trips, PerHours: integer;
xM, yM: integer;

procedure RandomWait(waittime, randtime: integer);
begin
if(randtime = waittime)then
begin
randtime := waittime + 2;
end;
wait(100 * waittime + random(100 * randtime));
end;

Procedure NotFind(Col: string);
begin
Logout;
Writeln('Could not find the ’ + col);
Writeln(‘Restart the script please.’);
Terminatescript;
end;

Procedure StoreAllButAxe;
begin
DepositArea(606, 214, 740, 455);
RandomWait(4, 5);
end;

Procedure WalkToTrees;
var
x, y: integer;
offx, offy: integer;
i: integer;
begin
if(FindColor(x, y, Banksym, 540, 6, 733, 135))then
begin
Mouse(x, y + 10, 3, 3, True);
Flag;
end;
x := 634;
y := 28;
if(FindColorSpiral(x, y, treesym, 561, 10, 740, 79))then
begin
Mouse(x - 40, y + 6, 2, 2, True);
end else
begin
NotFind(‘Could not find the tree symbol’);
end;
Setrun(true);
Wait(100 + random(200));
GameTab(4);
Flag;
repeat
wait(100);
i := i + 1;
until((FlagPresent) or (i = 15))
Flag;
if(Random(2) = 0)Then
begin
x := 611;
y := 62;
offx := 0;
offy := - 10;
end else
begin
x := 635;
y := 67;
offx := + 12;
offy := + 10;
end;
if(FindColorSpiral(x, y, treesym, 575, 8, 660, 77))then
begin
Mouse(x + offx, y + offy, 2, 2, True);
end else
begin
NotFind(‘Could not find the second tree symbol’);
end;
HumanFlag(8);
end;

Procedure WalkToBank;
var
x, y, offx, offy, i: integer;
begin
x := 653;
y := 103;
if(FindColorSpiral(x, y, treesym, 626, 61, 678, 111))then
begin
Mouse(x + 23, y + 39, 4, 4, True);
end else
begin
NotFind(‘Could not find the tree symbol’);
end;
SetRun(False);
HumanFlag(8);
While(not(Findcolor(x, y, banksym, 573, 10, 738, 147)) and (i < 3))do
begin
Mouse(x + 24, y + 38, 2, 2, True);
HumanFlag(8);
i := i + 1;
end;
if(Random(2) = 0)Then
begin
x := 679;
y := 108;
offx := - 11;
offy := - 3;
end else
begin
x := 679;
y := 108;
offx := 0;
offx := + 2;
end;
if(FindcolorSpiral(x, y, banksym, 599, 24, 747, 154))then
begin
Mouse(x + offx, y + offy, 2, 2, True);
end else
begin
NotFind(‘Could not find the bank symbol’);
end;
HumanFlag(8);
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
CheckRandoms(1, ‘hitpoints’, ‘S’, True, True, srtAll);
FixAxe(Wield);
end;

Procedure Cut_Trees;
var
x, y, sleepT: integer;
begin
x := 258;
y := 149;
if(FindObj(x, y, ‘Chop down Wil’, treecol, 2))then
begin
RandomWait(2, 3);
if(CheckEnt)then
begin
if(Findcolor(x, y, treesym, 561, 11, 732, 150))then
Mouse(x - 4, y + 10, 2, 2, True);
end;
RandomWait(2, 3);
Mouse(x, y, 3, 3, True);
Flag;
x := 261;
y := 165;
if(FindObj(x, y, ‘Chop down Wil’, treecol, 2))then
RandomWait(2, 3);
MMouse(x, y, 2, 2);
while(IsUpText(‘Chop down’) or(sleepT < 30) or (not(InvFull)))do
begin
RandomWait(2, 3);
if(CheckEnt) or (not(IsUpText(‘Chop down’)) or (BrokenAxe(Wield)))then
begin
RandomWait(2, 3);
Exit;
end;
RandomWait(2, 3);
Randoms;
sleepT := SleepT + 1;
end;
end else
begin
x := 291;
y := 80;
if(FindColorSpiral(x, y, treesym, 553, 9, 687, 82))then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, True);
HumanFlag(8);
end;
end;
end;

Procedure Cut;
begin
repeat
Cut_Trees;
Randoms;
until((InvFull) or (BrokenAxe(wield)))
end;

Procedure Bank;
var
Broken: boolean;
begin
Broken := BrokenAxe(wield);
if(Broken)then
begin
OpenBank;
RandomWait(2, 5);
DepositAll;
RandomWait(2, 5);
Writeln(‘Pick was broken’);
RandomWait(2, 5);
CloseWindow;
Logout;
TerminateScript;
end else
if(Broken = False)then
begin
OpenBank;
RandomWait(2, 5);
StoreAllButAxe;
CloseWindow;
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
var
LogsBanked: integer;
begin
ClearDebug;
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(’ ‘);
Writeln(‘Script has been running for ’ + ScriptTime2(2));
Writeln(inttostr(Trips) + ’ trips were made’);
if(wield = true)then
begin
LogsBanked := Trips * 28;
PerHours := (LogsBanked) / ScriptTime(2) * 60;
end else
if(wield = false)then
begin
LogsBanked := Trips * 27;
PerHours := (LogsBanked) / ScriptTime(2) * 60;
end;
Writeln(inttostr(LogsBanked) + ’ were banked.’);
Writeln(‘That is roughly ’ + inttostr(PerHours) + ’ per hour.’);
end;

procedure StartTehScriptPlocks;
begin
if((User1 = ‘’) and (Pass1 = ‘’))then
begin
Writeln(‘You do not have a username and password set in Si.scar.’);
Writeln(‘Fix this and restart the script please.’);
LogOut;
TerminateScript;
end else
if((not(User1 = ‘’)) and (not(Pass1 = ‘’)))then
begin
Writeln('Hello ’ + User1);
Writeln(‘Welcome and have fun!’);
Writeln(‘The Will0w Cutter will begin soon, kthx!’);
Wait(2000 + random(1000));
Writeln(‘Now!’);
end;
end;

begin
LoadInclude(‘89.com - Free Adult Directory - 89 - Free Sex Free Porn - Mozilla Firefox’);
StartTehScriptPlocks;
ActivateClient;
RandomWait(2, 5);
GetAxeColors(Wield);
MakeCompass(‘N’);
if(FindColor(xM, yM, BankSym, 534, 5, 746, 157))then
begin
Writeln(‘Starting from the bank’);
repeat
Walktotrees;
Cut;
WalkToBank;
Bank;
Trips := Trips + 1;
ProgressReport;
if(Trips mod 5 = 0)then //Thanks RSNoob.
MakeCompass(‘N’); //Didn’t know any other way to put this
until(false)
end else
if((FindColor(xM, yM, TreeSym, 607, 34, 665, 85)) and
not(FindColor(xM, yM, BankSym, 534, 5, 746, 157))) Then
begin
Writeln(‘Starting at the trees’);
repeat
Cut;
WalkToBank;
Bank;
WalkToTrees;
Trips := Trips + 1;
ProgressReport;
if(Trips mod 5 = 0)then //Thanks RSNoob.
MakeCompass(‘N’); //Didn’t know any other way to put this
until(false)
end else
begin
Writeln(‘Could not start! Set your colors correctly!’);
LogOut;
TerminateScript;
end;
end.
